messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] NEU Was Re: new here
messages.msgSnippet: Where can I learn to make stuff with duct tape? Jay may or may not be interested (he does like tape and Origami) but I m super interested. I made all kinds of
messages.messageBody:
Where can I learn to make stuff with duct tape? Jay may or may not be interested (he does like tape and Origami) but I'm super interested. I made all kinds of crafts as a kid.
Beth
Sent from my Verizon Wireless BlackBerry

-----Original Message-----
From: "swissarmy_wife" <heatherbean@...>

Date: Thu, 23 Apr 2009 18:20:12
To: <unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] NEU Was Re: new here


--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Debra Rossing" <debra.rossing@...> wrote:
>
> Excellent! We're doing a funshop on making duct tape flowers and DH will
> probably show folks who have their own rolls of tape how to do other
> stuff as well (we're not planning to bring enough tape for everyone to
> make tote bags and such but flowers don't take a lot of tape)
>
> Deb R

******FUN! I'll bring my rolls of duct tape for my family. We got really into duct tape for awhile. the kids made wallets, and bull whips. The whips are TOTALLY awesome.

I made a bunch of duct tape ATC's that I still have kicking around somewhere!

-Heather
========================================================================




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
Excellent! We're doing a funshop on making duct tape flowers and DH will
probably show folks who have their own rolls of tape how to do other
stuff as well (we're not planning to bring enough tape for everyone to
make tote bags and such but flowers don't take a lot of tape)

Deb R
